analyzed: de yang de la sogs pa nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi bcom mo //
translated: And so on, it says, ‚ÄúHe has destroyed the four hundred and four diseases.‚Äù

analyzed: lha'i gdon la sogs pa bgegs rigs mi gcig pa stong phrag brgyad cu'o //

analyzed: dug thams cad dang zhes bya ba ni /

analyzed: phyi'i dug gsum dang nang gi dug gsum phyi'i bsdad pa dang 'gro ba dang byed pa'o //

analyzed: bsdad pa ni btsan dug la sogs pa rtsva dang lo ma'i dug go //

analyzed: byed pa yang dbyig dug la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o //

original: nad thams cad dang zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: nad thams cad dang zhes bya ba ni /

original: bdag la bde legs su gyur cig ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: bdag la bde legs su gyur cig ces bya ba ni /
translated: May there be well-being for me means

original: mchan mo bde legs nyin bde legs //
analyzed: mchan mo bde legs nyin bde legs //

original: zhes bya ba ni rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis /

analyzed: nyi ma'i gung gis bde legs dang // zhes bya ba ni nyi ma phyed na yang mi bde bar mi gnas pa'o //

analyzed: grol gyur phyag 'tshal grol la phyag 'tshal lo //
